configurationId.description: Configuration ID of the server for which neighbors are being listed.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return in a single page of output.

neighborConfigurationIds.description: List of configuration IDs to test for one-hop-away.

nextToken.description: Token to retrieve the next set of results. For example, if you previously specified 100 IDs for ListServerNeighborsRequest$neighborConfigurationIds but set ListServerNeighborsRequest$maxResults to 10, you received a set of 10 results along with a token. Use that token in this query to get the next set of 10.

portInformationNeeded.description: Flag to indicate if port and protocol information is needed as part of the response.
